moreBlocks.otherOffices: Matonich Law (Main Office) 2031 East Second Avenue Matonich Building Hibbing, MN 55746

description:
Matonich Law has earned a solid reputation throughout the State of Minnesota for ranking client welfare as a primary priority while earning favorable verdicts and settlements in complex medical malpractice lawsuits, many in excess of $1 million.

Devoted solely to medical malpractice litigation, Matonich Law prepares cases for trial by relying on four decades of successful trial experience, the most qualified experts, high-tech courtroom displays, and financial resources to get the job done right.

With offices in Hibbing and Minneapolis, the three-lawyer firm possesses a wide range of experience in litigating plaintiff medical malpractice and products liability cases.
